quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it's bad.
quotes.author: Cory House

quotes.text: Term bug derived from an actual insect inside the machine in 1960's
quotes.author: Rahul Agrawal

quotes.text: I'm not gonna run away, I never go back on my word! That's my nindo: my ninja way!
quotes.author: Naruto
